name: The Absolute Unknown
description:
Lost in space you find youself facing strange creatures. Use their loot to ugprade your ship and make it as deep as you can handle! Maybe you can uncover the Absolute Unknown?

Action packed Bullet Hell gameplay

This bullet hell game features a variety of enemies and even two bosses, that all scale and become stronger, the further you play.  There are no dealth penalties. It's only you, your skill and diablo-style randomly generated items that determine, how far you can get!

Randomly generated Items

Choose your playstyle by picking gear that enhances your offense, defense or specializes in getting even better loot. Several gameplay mechanics and infinite scaling ensure that itemization never becomes irrelevant. 

Limitless fun

Each level only lasts a few minutes but you can easily spend dozens of hours, trying to reach the deepest depths of space in search of the Absolute Unknown. And in case you do want a fresh start, multiple save files are also supported.

How deep can you make it?
